I feel in safe hands and do keep returning whenever there is a dental need. She has steady and able hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Indeed it was a good experience with the Dr.I highly recommend those who hasn't seen the Dr. And off course I would love to see her again for further my treatment with her .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
As my daughter praised about her. Earlier l had got done the same job from Dentist in CGHS Dispensary no. 16 and Charak Palika Hospital.  I felt there, they people do their job not following the noble norms I think due to beaurocrcy part of nature involved and as far as Gandhi Clinic is concerned, they, I feel, get able to follow the human touch to save the future  carrier to get it bright.  In my view the doctor take little higher fee & charges but committed to their promise which they have done to the patient.  Although, in this developing country, all are constrained, inspite of that who has maintained its personality, has the right to rise and reach the peak of progress.

Keep it up

I hope from the clinic will shine like a star, in the way of keeping alive flame of huminity,the name  it has Gandhi, memorise the name of 'Bapu' father of nation.

Good luck to you

Tarsem Lal Ralhan
D- 177, Moti Bagh-I

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Kamal came across as a very seasoned doctor with a very realistic approach to the problem that we wanted to be addressed.
Her friendly nature and the usage of layman's language to explain the whole process of the treatment made it that much easier for us to relate to her.
Keep up the good work and as a educationist I would also suggest that you must talk to kids of various schools and colleges regarding the need and importance of good oral care more so with the very food habits amongst the youth.
Rgds

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Being my first attempt for a tooth implant I was a bit apprehensive about its success. However having undergone the whole process lasting six months at Gandhi's Dental  Care I am extremely satisfied with the result and enjoying benefits of healthy teeth. The doctor and the staff were always encouraging, professional, efficient and effective. Thanks and best wishes

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have known Dr Kamal  Gandhi for many years now  & have always found her to be a  great doctor & wonderful person. Our experience with her for any dental problem has always been well taken care of with  complete satisfaction & comfort. Besides this, our visit to her clinc has always been pleasant with her good natured staff who have been with her for over a decade. That speaks for itself.  In current day scenario, a doctor like her is a boon for sure.

review: We are U.S. citizens and we've been seeing Dr Kamal Gandhi since last seven plus years. I would love to recommend Dr.Kamal Gandhi to everyone who is reading this, take my word for it  If you love your teeth so you need to see Dr.Kamal Gandhi at Gandhi Dental Care , G35 Vasant Vihar New Delhi...Quality work, professionalism, hygiene fully maintained, sweet and helpful staff. Keep up the good work!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with Dr Gandhi has always been a pleasant one. Her treatment is done with a professional and yet gentle touch. She clearly explains what needs to be done and  is patient in hearing you out. She uses modern equipment and maintains a high level of hygiene. In terms of expense it is money well spent. I have recommended her to others with confidence.
